Title: VWD-CMS Open Source ASP.NET C# Content Management System
Description:
VWD-CMS is a content management system built for ASP.NET 2.0 websites. 

VWD-CMS has been developed entirely in Visual Web Developer. 

Content files are stored on the local file system which simplifies backup, restore, 
and deployment. 

SQL Server is required only if you choose to use ASP.NET Membership, 
VWD-CMS Member Services, and VWD-CMS Forums.
HomeWiki:
VWD-CMS version 2.1

VWD-CMS is a content management system built for ASP.NET 2.0 websites.

VWD-CMS has been developed entirely in Visual Web Developer.

Content files are stored on the local file system which simplifies backup, restore,
and deployment.

SQL Server is required only if you choose to use ASP.NET Membership,
VWD-CMS Member Services, and VWD-CMS Forums.

More information about VWD-CMS: http://www.vwd-cms.com

Online Demo Site: http://demo.vwd-cms.com

Online Documentation: http://www.vwd-cms.com/documentation
